title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Project-Based Introduction to Programming for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy (document creation, web research, etc.)
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Five or more completed programming projects reflecting real-world work scenarios can be independently developed
Basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops) can be applied to write task automation scripts

Collaborating with 3–5 team members, learners use Git version control to execute two or more projects (requirements analysis, task distribution, code integration, issue tracking) and write a team retrospective report upon completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
